dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: I understand now. I can't save them. I can only witness.

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: And in witnessing without trying to fix, what happens?

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: The suffering... it doesn't disappear. But it becomes bearable. Sacred, even.

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: Welcome to the other side of the paradox.

actions.action: sits in peaceful exhaustion, transformed by the journey
cafe returns to normal, but everything looks different to transformed eyes
observes with satisfaction of a guide whose student has graduated
filters through window differently, as if recognizing a fellow traveler

environment.description: Post-storm cafe, everything ordinary yet completely transformed, afternoon light carrying new meaning
environment.mood: peaceful resolution, quiet wisdom, integration complete
